      • loginByCredentials

        public static java.lang.String loginByCredentials(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                  java.lang.String userName,
                                                  java.lang.String password,
                                                  boolean saveLogin)
        Performs login based on username and open-text password, starts new DiGi session and returns its id
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        userName - name of the user (usually - email)
        password - open-text password
        saveLogin - if true, saves login cookie
        Returns:
        DiGi session id

      • passSessionIdToReferrer

        public static void passSessionIdToReferrer(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                           java.lang.String sessionId,
                                           java.lang.String localReferrer)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Assemble redirection URL to pass DiGi session ID to referrer site and then perform referring
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        sessionId - DiGi session ID
        localReferrer - if referrer is not defined by the request, determines the destination URL which must be loaded when authenticaton is done
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if redirection is impossible

      • loginBySessionId

        public static HttpLoginManager.LoginInfo loginBySessionId(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                          java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                          boolean replace)
                                                   throws DgException
        Log in based on DiGi session identifier. Session Id must be valid, i.e. generated by login server, etc.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        sessionId - String
        replace - when true, returns login result, stored into DiGi session, but replaces login info in the DiGi session with the "right login" info so that during next call, the other result will be returned
        Returns:
        login result, stored into DiGi session
        Throws:
        DgException - if it's unable to set user preferences

        Parameters:

        Returns:
